timeline.bodyText: Do we want to fail the test if follower is no longer a follower, or should we just ignore test result in that case?  If the latter, it may be better to change this to Assume.assumeTrue.
timeline.author: adoroszlai

replies.bodyText: There are no failures being induced till this check so, follower should still be a follower. I would prefer to fail the test in that case.
replies.author: bshashikant
